origin.thorigins.element_fox.name: Element Fox
origin.thorigins.element_fox.description: You Have Enabled One of Your Element Power and Become the Actual Non-Average Fox
origin.thorigins.default_fox.name: Fox
origin.thorigins.default_fox.description: Just an Ordinary Fox, With Little to No Ability in Commiting Crimes :3
thtransform_interface.name: §6§l§nChange Form
thtransform_interface.description: Become a fox with paranormal abilities!
thtransform.key: Active ability, press [%s] to perform transformation
cannot_forward_karma: You have reached the end of your current karmic journey
unlock_karma_path: With the power of the Dragon Egg, you have set foot on a new karmic path.
completed_karma_path: You have completed both of the karmic paths
thkarma_interface.name: §6§l§nKarma
thkarma_interface.description: Your deeds weave your fate, as unseen forces tally your karmic path.
thkarma_interface.key:
Active ability, press [%s] while sneaking to glimpse your current karmic alignment, or...

§8By sacrificing the world's rarest treasure, you can regain the possibility of another extremity
thchoice.name: §6§l§nPower Array
thchoice.description: Switch among all your active abilities freely.
thchoice.key:
Active ability, press [%s] to switch to the next active ability
If pressed while sneaking, switch to the previous active ability instead
thswift2.name: §a§nAgility++
thswift2.description: Your fox body has truly transcended, to a state beyond normal foxes' comprehension.
thswift2.info:
[§a+§r] §aFaster§r speed and §ahigher§r jumping when sprinting
[§a+§r] Sprint a little bit faster when not holding an item
[§a+§r] Ignore fall distance < §a36§r
[§a+§r] §e§nCrouch§r when §6landing§r will neglect §a§lmost§r of the fall damage
thshy2.name: §c§nTimidity++
thshy2.description: Out of the foodchain, you no longer fear your natural predators.
thshy2.info:
[§c-§r] Shake, and get Weakness + Speed effects when:
§b1§r. Near §c§mPolar Bear§r / §c§mWolf§r / §6Villager§r / §1Warden§r / §7Wither§r / §5Ender Dragon§r
§b2§r. Spawn of §eLightning§r
§b3§r. Low §cHealth§r
§b4§r. In the other 2 Dimensions
§b5§r. Near Human / Enderian / Blazeborn / Shulk Origin Player

[§c-§r] Can't fall asleep when the above effects are present
thweak2.name: §c§nWeak++
thweak2.description: You are now strong enough to wear the heaviest armor.
thweak2.info:
[§c-§r] Cannot use shield
§m[§c-§r§m] Gain Slowness and Weakness when equipping heavy armors§r
[§c-§r] Have less air when under water
thfoxiality_interface.info:
Your Predators' §5§lEXTRA STRIKE§r has the following effects:
§b1§r. Applies §5Slowness§r + Weakness + Nausea to you
§b2§r. Deals a §egreater§r amount of ❂§lTRUE DAMAGE§r
§b3§r. Temporarily §cNullifies§r your [§aAgility++§r]'s first effect
§b4§r. Temporarily §cDisables§r your natural regeneration

§8§oWearing armors and Resistance might make your predators' §lEXTRA STRIKE §r§8§ofail
origin.thorigins.lightning_fox.name: Lightning Fox
origin.thorigins.lightning_fox.descripti: Foxes Who Can Withstand Hundreds of Thunder Struck
lightning_fox.thdischarge.name: §6§l§nDischarge
lightning_fox.thdischarge.description: Charge up and release an intense burst of electricity that ionizes and neutralizes nearby living organisms.
thdischarge.key:
Active ability, double tap and hold [%s] to charge up
Press [%s] to activate
thdischarge.info:
There are §b3§r discharge level you can reach
The higher the level, the further the range and deadlier the effect

When Charging:
[§a+§r] Expose mobs in your effect range
[§a+§r] Slowe down and damage mobs close to you with your electric field
[§c-§r] Charging can be easily interrupted

§cYou can't use this skill if you have no hunger
lightning_fox.thbecome_lightning.name: §6§l§nBecome Lightning
lightning_fox.thbecome_lightning.descrip: Become lightning，fly freely and struck whoever you want. Remember to do adequate water protection，water is lethal to you in this state.
thbecome_lightning.key: Active ability, press [%s] to enter lightning state
thbecome_lightning.info:
Lightning State:
§b1§r. Able to fly quickly
§b2§r. Extinguish nearby fire if you are fast enough
§b3§r. Smite nearby entities if you are fast enough
§b4§r. Exhaust quickly
§b5§r. Take damage from water
§b6§r. Receive 2x Damage

§cYou can't use this skill if you have no hunger or wearing anything!
lightning_fox.thelectric_beam.name: §6§l§nElectric Beam
lightning_fox.thelectric_beam.descriptio: Overcharge your enermy with Electric beam.
thelectric_beam.key: Active ability, press [%s] to shoot a beam of electricy that jumps among enemies
thelectric_beam.info:
Attack can jump to nearby entities
Can cause damage at most 4 times
lightning_fox.thrailgun.name: §6§l§nRailgun
lightning_fox.thrailgun.description: By manipulating electromagnetic field, launch an iron nugget at an insanely high speed that will destroy everything in its path.
thrailgun.key: Active ability, press [%s] with iron nugget and [%s] during a suitable time
thrailgun.info:
When it is the right time to activate, there will be a blue screen overlay as a hint

§cYou can't use this skill if you have no hunger
lightning_fox.thlightning_combat.name: §a§nAspect of Lightning
lightning_fox.thlightning_combat.descrip: Channel with the power of lightning.
thlightning_combat.info:
[§a+§r] If you are struck by lightning, or use any Active Skills, you'll become overcharged and receive positive effects for a few seconds
[§a+§r] Attach lightning in your paws when attack with no weapon
[§a+§r] Have a chance to electrocute your attacker if you are poorly insulated
[§a+§r] Stay crouching to generate a static field that nullifies part of incoming damage
lightning_fox.thlightning_traits.name: §e§nEnhanced Bioelectricity
lightning_fox.thlightning_traits.descrip: You can overclock your body for better performance, but at a cost of higher energy requirement.
thlightning_traits.info:
[§a+§r] Faster movement speed
[§a+§r] Faster attack speed
[§a+§r] Faster mining speed
[§c-§r] Increased exhaustion
lightning_fox.thfluffy3.name: §e§nFluffy*
lightning_fox.thfluffy3.description: Your fluff hardens under static charge, turning you into a spikey floof. Might be a bad idea to cuddle...
thfluffy3.info:
[§e~§r] Have a chance to prick surrounding creatures if either of you moved
[§e~§r] Damage even more if either of you sprinted
[§a+§r] Stay sneaking to not hurt anyone with your fluff
death.attack.thorigins:foxie_zap: %s tried to become a battery but failed horribly.
origin.thorigins.fire_fox.name: Fire Fox
origin.thorigins.fire_fox.description: Foxes Who Can Thrive in Scorching Hell and Dance with the Eternal Flame.
fire_fox.thcannon.name: §6§l§nInferno Cannon
fire_fox.thcannon.description: Unleash the heat stored within your body to incinerate everything in your path.
thcannon.key:
Active ability, press [%s] to choose a Fire Power, hold [%s] to warm up

For Fire Power 4, press [%s] to cast after warmed up
thcannon.info:
[§c-§r] You can't move during firing / warming up

Fire Power Index
§b0§r. Deactivated
§b1§r. Firecharge
§b2§r. Fireball
§b3§r. Laser Cutter
§b4§r. THE BIG ONE
fire_fox.ththrust.name: §6§l§nFlame Wings
fire_fox.ththrust.description: Temporarily create a pair of flame wings to soar the skies.
ththrust.key0:
At the cost of stored temperature, press [%s] when falling to fly

While flying, press [%s] to thrust forward.
Hold it for a continuous small thrust

When flying with flame wings, press [%s] to close them in mid-air
ththrust.key1:
If you've activated [§6§lInferno Cannon§r] and are holding [%s], you would create an explosion upon high-speed impact

When Fire Power <= 2, explosion is fake and rather a safe prank :3
Else, >:3
ththrust.info:
[§c-§r] Falling in water will immediately extinguish the flame wings
[§c-§r] Flying in rain will lose more temperature
fire_fox.thfire_aspect.name: §a§nAspect of the Fire
fire_fox.thfire_aspect.description: Wield fire and flames against your enermies.
thfire_aspect.info:
[§a+§r] Fire immunity
[§a+§r] Receive less explosion damage
[§a+§r] Navigate freely in Lava
[§a+§r] Move slightly faster when on fire
[§a+§r] Your bare paw will set mobs on fire
[§a+§r] Your enemies will be ignited if you have high enough temperature
[§a+§r] Able to consume BlazeRod to replenish temperature
fire_fox.thtemperature.name: §e§nInternal Heat
fire_fox.thtemperature.description: Your temperature greatly affects your combat performance.
thtemperature.info:
You have an internal temperature storage
Multiple factors will affect your temperature

Your Active Skills consume Temperature when used

[§a+§r] Gain Positive Effects when temperature is high
[§c-§r] Receive Negative Effects when temperature is low
[§c-§r] Start freezing when the temperature is critically low


§7Pro tip: Cuddles are great medicine for hypothermia :3
fire_fox.thfluffy2.name: §e§nFluffy*
fire_fox.thfluffy2.description: Your exquisite, plush fur provides heat insulation for you to keep warm, but can be lethally troublesome once drenched.
thfluffy2.info:
[§a+§r] Ignore Freeze Damage when fur is dry / high temperature
[§a+§r] Periodically gain temperature when fur is dry
[§c-§r] Take 4x more Freeze Damage when fur is drenched
[§c-§r] When in water / snow for too long: Slow down & Periodically lose temperature
[§e~§r] No longer in touch with water / snow, stand still to dry off via shaking
origin.thorigins.kitsune.name: Kitsune
origin.thorigins.kitsune.description: Aspect of The Life, Health and Nature. The Being Above All Creatures
kitsune.thchoice.info:
Power Index
§b0§r. Pounce++
§b1§r. Ascension
§b2§r. Tail Pouch
§b3§r. Spiritual Grace
kitsune.thdash2.name: §6§l§nPounce++
kitsune.thdash2.description: Your divine body is lighter than before, you can now pounce longer.
thdash2.info:
[§a+§r] Pounce Further
[§a+§r] Infinite Pounce before landing
[§a+§r] Greatly Reduced Exhaustion
[§a+§r] Pounce-Added Reach increased
kitsune.thhunt2.name: §6§l§nHunt++
kitsune.thhunt2.description: You can feel the essence of creatures around you, boosting your sensing ability to a longer range.
thhunt2.info:
[§a+§r] Sense Range is doubled
[§a+§r] Prepare Stage is shorten by 50%
[§a+§r] Falling and Pounce no longer reset Prepare Stage
thstorage2.name: §6§l§nTail Pouch
thstorage2.description: Hide items in your nine fluffy tails.
thstorage2.key: Active ability, press [%s] to store items in your tails
kitsune.thphasing.name: §6§l§nAscension
kitsune.thphasing.description: Your body transcends the normal realm, no longer bounded by the physical world.
kitsune.thphasing.info:
While in this form:
§b1§r. Able to walk on air when not equipping §eheavy armors§r
§b2§r. Able to phase through walls when not equipping §canything§r
§b3§r. Halve all incoming damage
§b4§r. Cannot use weapons
§b5§r. Cannot melee
kitsune.thphasing.key: Active ability, press [%s] to ascend into your ethereal form
kitsune.thheal.name: §6§l§nSpiritual Grace
kitsune.thheal.description: Your essence radiates with pure grace, uplifting the living and dispelling the cursed.
thheal.key:
Active ability, press [%s] to toggle regenerating aura

Press [%s] while crouching to boost the vitality of all living beings around you

Press [%s] against a mob with empty hands to heal it

On backpack, pick up a seed and [%s] on another seed will craft a Sweetberries
In same way, Glow Ink Sack + Sweetberries = GlowBerries
thheal.info:
Your spiritual power will harm the undead beings

§8You might tame the wild creatures that you healed with touch
thheal.aura.cursed: §4The divine aura corroded your undead body
thheal.burst.blessed: §2The spiritual presence awarded you with power and good fortune
thheal.burst.cursed: §4The divine spirit harmed your undead essence
thheal.boop.blessed: §2You're booped, and blessed by this gentle spirit
kitsune.thfluffy4.name: §e§nFluffy*
kitsune.thfluffy4.description: Your exquisite, soft fur remains untouched by the world's impurities. Those who caress the heavenly coat shall be graced with good fortune and calmness.
thfluffy4.info:
[§e~§r] Bless mobs close to you with Luck and Regeneration
[§e~§r] Cleanse poison / wither / unluck / bad omen and ninetail's curses away from mobs close to you
thfluffy4.blessed: §2You feel holy serenity as the fur's touch lifts your afflictions
thfluffy4.cursed: §4Touch of the pure fur burned your undead body
kitsune.thfoxiality2.name: §e§nFoxiality++
kitsune.thfoxiality2.description: Your natural predators no longer consider you a food source, you are also able to see clearer in the dark.
thfoxiality2.info:
[§a+§r] §aStronger§r Permanent night vision
[§a+§r] Higher damage against prey mobs
[§a+§r] Ignore berry bushes
[§a+§r] Breaking berry bushes gives you sweet berries
[§a+§r] Receive a random item when waking up
[§c-§r] Can't fall asleep when not under shades
[§a+§r] Do more damage to Merling and Avian
[§c-§r] Receive more damage from Blazeborn
[§a+§r] Dig extremely fast with claws(empty handed)
[§a+§r] Climb in Powder Snow
[§a+§r] Trusted by foxes
§m[§c-§r§m] Anger wolves and polar bears§r
thfoxiality2.info1: §m[§c-§r§m] Predators do a deadlier §5§l§mEXTRA STRIKE §r§f§mto you after every hit
thfoxiality2.info2:
§f۞§r §fYou are a§r §e§lDivine Creature§r §f۞§r

[§e~§r] You deal / receive §emore§r damage from / to §8§lUndead monsters§r
[§c-§r] You deal less damage to §c§lall other Mobs§r
[§e~§r] Part of your abilities work differently against §8§lUndead monsters§r
[§a+§r] You are §aimmune§r to §5Unluck§r / §5Darkness§r / §5Blindness§r status effects
[§e~§r] Some §aPositive§r & §cNegative§r status effects will have a higher amplitude on you
origin.thorigins.ninetails.name: Ninetails
origin.thorigins.ninetails.description: Mastered the Arts of Killing and Deception. This Creature is a Nightmare to Most Living Beings
ninetails.thchoice.info:
Power Index
§b0§r. Pounce++
§b1§r. Abyssion 
§b2§r. Tail Pouch
§b3§r. Soul Dominion
ninetails.thdash3.name: §6§l§nPounce++
ninetails.thdash3.description: §o"When you move, fall like a thunder bolt."§r
thdash3.info:
[§a+§r] Maximum Pounce before landing significantly increased
[§a+§r] Pounce-Enhanced Damage Increased
[§a+§r] Pounce-Added Reach increased
[§a+§r] Reduced Cooldown
[§a+§r] Greatly Reduced Exhaustion
[§a+§r] Pouncing kill will reset the first pounce's cooldown
ninetails.thsoul_power.name: §6§l§nSoul Dominion
ninetails.thsoul_power.description: Harness the souls of the fallen to fuel your power, bending their essence to your will. Collect, curse, and control with unyielding force.
thsoul_power.key:
Active ability, press [%s] to shoot a curse beam
Press [%s] while crouching to engulf stored souls for power

Press [%s] against a mob while crouching to seize a fragment of its soul

Hold [%s] to turn empty bottles into experience bottle
thsoul_power.info0:
You need enough souls to power your skills

Kill creatures for their souls
Or Stand under the sun or moon to slowly collect nature essence as substitute
thsoul_power.info1:
Curse Effects:
§b1§r. Last for 10s
§b2§r. Apply Nausea, Wither and Unluck Effects
§b3§r. Take more damage from Ninetails
§b4§r. When hit by Ninetails:
   §b4.1§r. Apply Weakness and Slowness
   §b4.2§r. Ninetails gain a fraction of souls
thsoul_power.soul_harvest: §4You endured agonizing pain as your soul is ripped apart vigorously...
thcurse.added: §4A strange unease creeps over you as the curse takes hold...
thcurse.removed: §4A sense of relief washes over you as the curse fades away...
thcurse.milk: §4Your attempt to lift the curse with milk was refused >:3
ninetails.thhunt3.name: §6§l§nHunt++
ninetails.thhunt3.description: You stare directly into your preys' soul. exploiting every weak spot on them.
thhunt3.info0:
[§a+§r] Doubled Hunt duration
[§a+§r] Buffed §5§lEXTRA STRIKE§r effects
[§a+§r] Always Mid-Night Damage Buff in Hunt Stage
[§a+§r] Slightly reducing received damage in Hunt Stage
[§a+§r] Sense Effect prolonged to the end of Hunt
thhunt3.info1:
Your §5§lEXTRA STRIKE§r has the following effects:
§b1§r. Applies Weakness + Nausea + §aDarkness§r to your target
§b2§r. Deals an §aincreased§r amount of ❂§lTRUE DAMAGE§r
§b3§r. Feeds you Foodpoints and §amore Saturation§r
§b4§r. Extends the Hunt §alonger§r
§b5§r. §aHeals you 1 health§r
ninetails.thphasing.name: §6§l§nAbyssion
ninetails.thphasing.description: Plunge into the abyss, forsaking the living realm and slipping through the veil of reality.
ninetails.thphasing.key: Active ability, press [%s] to descend into your abyssal form
ninetails.thphasing.info:
While in this form:
§b1§r. Able to walk on air when not equipping §eheavy armors§r
§b2§r. Able to phase through walls when not equipping §canything§r
§b3§r. Reduce all incoming damage
§b4§r. Cannot use weapons
§b5§r. Cannot melee
ninetails.thfluffy5.name: §e§nFluffy*
ninetails.thfluffy5.description: Your fur, soaked in blood and death. Soft to the touch, but invokes fear and awe in those near.
thfluffy5.info: [§e~§r] Apply effects from [§cTimidity§r] to mobs close to you
thfear.added: §4A surge of dread overwhelms you as the cursed fur brushes against you
thfear.removed: §4The oppressive fear fades, leaving you with a sense of uneasy calm
ninetails.thfoxiality3.name: §e§nFoxiality++
ninetails.thfoxiality3.description: You are able to see clearer in the dark, and your natural predators find it harder to threaten you.
thfoxiality3.info:
[§a+§r] §aStronger§r Permanent night vision
[§a+§r] Higher damage against preys mobs
[§a+§r] Ignore berry bushes
[§a+§r] Breaking berry bushes gives you sweet berries
[§a+§r] Receive a random item when waking up
[§c-§r] Can't fall asleep when not under shades
[§a+§r] Do more damage to Merling and Avian
[§c-§r] Receive more damage from Blazeborn
[§a+§r] Dig extremely fast with claws(empty handed)
[§a+§r] Climb in Powder Snow
[§a+§r] Trusted by foxes
[§c-§r] Anger wolves and polar bears
thfoxiality3.info1: [§c-§r] Predators do a §aweaker§r §5§lEXTRA STRIKE §r§fto you after every hit
thfoxiality3.info1_legacy: §m[§c-§r§m] Wolves and Polar Bears do more damage to you§r
thfoxiality3.info2:
Your Predators' §5§lEXTRA STRIKE§r has the following effects:
§m§b1§r§m. Applies §5§mSlowness§r§m + Weakness + Nausea to you§r
§r§b2§r. Deals a §alesser§r amount of ❂§lTRUE DAMAGE§r
§b3§r. Temporarily §cDisables§r your [§6§lPounce++§r]
§b4§r. Temporarily §cNullifies§r your [§aAgility++§r]'s first effect
§b5§r. Temporarily §cDisables§r your natural regeneration

§8§oWearing armors and Resistance might make your predators' §lEXTRA STRIKE §r§8§ofail
thfoxiality3.info3:
§f☠§r §fYou are a§r §8§lUndead Demon§r §f☠§r

[§a+§r] You receive §aless§r damage from §7Undead monsters§r
[§c-§r] §5Smite§r Enchantment is effective against you
[§e~§r] Certain Origins' abilities work differently against you
[§e~§r] Some Status effects are reversed or nullified on you
[§c-§r] Your preferred foods no longer gives you regeneration effect because of it
[§c-§r] You are extra vulnerable to §l§6Wooden Sword§r with §5Smite§r
origin.thorigins.ice_fox.name: Ice Fox
origin.thorigins.ice_fox.description:
Ice fox W.I.P :3 
You aren't supposed to see this
I'm too lazy to code so all you can have rn is the Fluffy* skill
ice_fox.thfluffy6.name: Fluffy*
ice_fox.thfluffy6.description: Soft Fur with a hard layer of ice beneath, gives you natural armor and resistance to slice and piercing. but swim slow cuz water freezes around you and increases drag:3333
thfluffy6.info: Give chills to everyone around you :3 This power is almost done perhaps?
layer.thorigins.origin.name: element
origins.thorigins.no_element: You havn't unlocked a special fox!
origins.thorigins.untransformable: Your ability to transform has been turned off by an admin!
origins.thorigins.sleepin_notransform: You are in [Sleepin Mode], wake up to transform!
